subject: Pedals
description_text:
Hi,

Can I use your Pro X Ultra Sim Racing Pedal with Haptic Reactor with my
Fanatec CSL DD pro base?

Regards,
Tautvydas Tavoras

conversations.body_text: Hi Tautvydas Tavoras,  Yes, it works. This is how we use it in our testing environment, and many of our customers are also using it in the same way.

Do you have any discount codes?

Regards,
Tautvydas Tavoras


On Fri, 3 Oct 2025 at 05:29, service@simsonn.com
Hi Tautvydas Tavoras,    Sorry for the delayed response—we just wrapped up our 8-day holiday break. You can use this $35 store celebration discount: CNFRCS  Note: Valid on orders over $199.
